# The Ship Inn Porlock Weir - Website Project

This is a modern B&B website project for The Ship Inn in Porlock Weir, built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Sanity CMS.

## Project Structure
- Modern responsive design inspired by The Residence Dartmouth
- 8 main pages: Home, Rooms, Food & Drink, Things to Do, Events & News, Gallery, Contact, Legal
- Sanity.io integration for blog/news management
- SEO optimization and image optimization
- Maritime/countryside theme appropriate for Porlock Weir location

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Follow Next.js 14+ best practices with App Router
- Optimize images and implement SEO meta tags
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Use modern React patterns and hooks
